
```{r}

starting_prices = seq(5:300)
yearly_stds = seq(0.1, 0.5, 0.05)



generateData = function(n, yearly_return, yearly_std, starting_price) {
  price = rep(NA, n)
  price[1] = starting_price
  for (i in 2:n) {
    noise = rnorm(1,0,yearly_std)
    prev = price[i - 1]
    price[i] = prev + prev * (yearly_return/n + noise/sqrt(n))
  }
  return (price)
}

data = generateData(100, 0.25, .50, 100)
data
plot(data, type = 'l')
```
